text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The time spent in my shining presence<n>has given
rise to your knightly skill. Be<n>grateful!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Now, we must return home at once to<n>prepare a
stage! These little ones have<n>waited long enough!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I know! I'll prepare the best seat in<n>the house
for you, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, you'll be put in the center of the<n>front row!
As a reward for that brilliant<n>rescue, you may
bask in my radiance to<n>your heart's content!
